TestDescription.name: Apache Struts 2 ClassLoader manipulation and denial of service
TestDescription.Description: The default upload mechanism in Apache Struts 2 is based on Commons FileUpload version 1.3 which is vulnerable and allows DoS attacks. Additional ParametersInterceptor allows access to 'class' parameter which is directly mapped to getClass() method and allows ClassLoader manipulation.
TestDescription.Impact: This vulnerability allows ClassLoader manipulation. An attacker can read arbitrary files from the server, execute arbitrary code and cause Denial of Service conditions.
